Pushpa 2 Reloaded: Here’s what’s new in the extended version - 123telugu
summary:
Pushpa 2 Reloaded: Here’s what’s new in the extended version

Date: January 17, 2025
Source: 123telugu

Allu Arjun’s Pushpa 2: The Rule became a global sensation, grossing over Rs. 1830 crore. Now, with 20 extra minutes of footage, the Reloaded version, released on January 17, 2025, takes the excitement to a new level. Here’s what’s new in the movie.

  • Pushpa’s Childhood Courage: A flashback showing young Pushpa's bravery retrieving a cricket ball from a lake.
  • SP Shekhawat’s Dark Scheme: Pushpa's encounter with Mangalam Srinu leads to a more sinister plot involving red sandalwood.
  • Global Smuggling Network: Shekhawat launches an investigation into smuggling operations connecting Sri Lanka and Japan.
  • Power Struggles in the Syndicate: Rao Ramesh pressures Pushpa for information about his red sandalwood stockpile.
  • Pushpa’s Daring Mission to Japan: Pushpa travels to Japan to resolve payment issues related to red sandalwood.
  • Confronting Jal Reddy: Pushpa faces Jal Reddy after a tragic death in the syndicate.
  • Emotional Reunion: Pushpa's brother returns a childhood locket, resolving past conflicts.
  • Tease for Pushpa 3: The celebration is interrupted by an explosion leading into the next chapter.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Reloaded: Here’s what’s new in the extended version

Kangana Ranaut shines not only as an actress but also as a director in the film Emergency. The review highlights her performance along with the cast's ability to depict significant moments in Indian political history.

  • The film offers a balanced portrayal of Indira Gandhi, showcasing both her strengths and weaknesses.
  • It discusses the events leading to one of the darkest phases in Indian politics.
  • Highlights the personal life of Indira Gandhi and her relationship with her family.
  • Presents a bold cinematic retelling of controversial political history.
  • Notes Kangana Ranaut's outstanding performance as Indira Gandhi.
“India is Indira and Indira is India.”

Rating: 3 out of 5

In conclusion, Emergency is a compelling film that examines the complexities of political power and personal struggles faced by Indira Gandhi, making it noteworthy for both cinema lovers and history enthusiasts.

Azaad, starring Aaman Devgn and Rasha Thadani in the lead roles, hit theatres today nationwide. The film is expected to have a poor opening at the box office.

summary:
Game Changer 1st Week Worldwide Gross Collections

Publication Date: January 11, 2025 Source: TrackTollywood

The latest political action drama starring Ram Charan and directed by Shankar had a decent box office start but struggled to maintain momentum due to mixed reviews and competition from other films.

  • Collected over 85 Cr gross on the first day.
  • First-week worldwide gross collections totaled approximately 187 Cr.
  • The Telugu version grossed about 145 Cr.
  • To break even, the film needs over 450 Cr.
  • Currently, it has recovered only 42% of the required gross in its first week.
  • Similar to previous films, this new release has been deemed a disappointment for Ram Charan and director Shankar.
“It’s likely to close with less than 50% recovery at this pace.”

With a weak trend, the film is expected to face significant challenges in recouping its production costs.

summary:
Actor Saif Ali Khan stabbed: CCTV camera footage showed the suspected attacker scurrying down the stairs from the sixth floor of the Satguru Sharan building.

Date: Jan 17, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan was attacked and stabbed multiple times in his Bandra apartment. He underwent emergency surgery and is now reported out of danger.

  • Saif Ali Khan suffered six stab wounds, including one to his neck.
  • The incident occurred around 2:30 AM when Khan was at home with his family.
  • He was attacked by an intruder demanding a ransom of ₹1 crore but did not break into the flat.
  • The suspected attacker escaped via the stairs and is still at large.
  • Questions arise regarding security and potential insider involvement.
“Several questions remain unanswered, raising concerns about the security breach in one of Mumbai's most secure residential areas.”

This incident highlights significant security issues in the local community and calls for improvements to ensure the safety of residents.

The attack on Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan has left both friends and family in a state of shock. Kareena Kapoor Khan shared her struggles in processing the day’s traumatic events.

  • Saif Ali Khan was attacked at his residence in Mumbai, suffering six stab wounds.
  • He underwent a five-hour surgery and is reported to be out of danger.
  • Family and friends have rushed to his side at the hospital, expressing their support on social media.

  • Concerns over safety in Mumbai have been raised by various political figures following the incident.

title: Game Changer box office collection day 7: Ram Charan, Shankar film continues to struggle, earns just Rs... - DNA India
summary:
Game Changer box office collection day 7: Ram Charan, Shankar film continues to struggle, earns just Rs...

Publication Date: January 17, 2025

Source: DNA India

The political action thriller Game Changer continues to face challenges at the box office following its release on January 10. With stiff competition from other films, its earnings have suffered significantly.

  • Game Changer has earned Rs 113 crore net in India and grossed Rs 165 crore worldwide in the first six days.
  • On its seventh day, it made an additional Rs 4.75 crore, totalling Rs 118 crore net for the week.
  • The film has been made on a budget of Rs 450 crore, and projections suggest it may not reach Rs 200 crore globally.
  • It is competing against other notable releases like Daaku Maharaaj and Sankranthiki Vasthunam, both of which have drawn larger crowds.
“The makers of Game Changer were accused of inflating their box office numbers, reporting an opening day figure of Rs 186 crore gross worldwide.”

In conclusion, Game Changer’s box office performance raises concerns about its financial viability, especially given the high production costs and competition from other films.
newTitle: Game Changer Box Office Collection - Day 7 Update

title: Kareena Kapoor breaks silence on attack on Saif Ali Khan: ‘Kindly respect our boundaries and give us space’ - Hindustan Times
summary:
Kareena Kapoor speaks out after attack on Saif Ali Khan: 'Respect our boundaries'

Date: January 16, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

Kareena Kapoor has expressed her feelings regarding the recent attack on her husband Saif Ali Khan, who was stabbed during a burglary attempt at their home in Mumbai. She called for respect for their privacy during this difficult time.

  • Kareena responded to the attack on Saif, asking for boundaries and peace for her family.
  • She described the day as incredibly challenging and requested an end to relentless media scrutiny and speculation.
  • After her statement, several celebrities from the film industry showed their support, including Arjun Kapoor and Sonam Kapoor.
“It has been an incredibly challenging day for our family, and we are still trying to process the events that have unfolded,” Kareena stated.

The incident occurred early Thursday morning, and despite the serious nature of the attack, Saif is now stable after undergoing emergency surgery.
newTitle: Kareena Kapoor speaks out after attack on Saif Ali Khan: 'Respect our boundaries'
